title: Six
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 60L
description: In Six, students are presented with the number six in a variety of ways. Detailed illustrations and repetitive text support early emergent readers. Students will also love looking for the hidden numeral six on each page! In addition to working on decoding skills, students will have the opportunity to identify main idea and details and connect to prior knowledge.
meta: coat, dresses, gloves, hats, pants, shirts, shorts, six, socks
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /s/ sound
Consonants : Identify initial and final consonant Ss
Capitalization : Capitalize the beginning of sentences
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word six
